tuv.seg: If you have been flooded you may be able to get financial help from the Department of Social Protection’s Humanitarian Assistance Scheme
Má bhí tú thíos le tuile, b’fhéidir go mbeidh tú ábalta cabhair airgeadais a fháil ó Scéim um Chabhair Dhaonnúil na Roinne Coimirce Sóisialaí
The means-tested scheme provides emergency financial assistance to households who are not able to meet costs for essential needs immediately following flooding
Soláthraíonn an scéim ar a ndéantar tástáil mhaoine cabhair airgeadais éigeandála do theaghlaigh nach bhfuil in ann íoc as na costais ar riachtanais bhuntábhachtacha go díreach i ndiaidh tuile
The scheme aims to provide financial support to people who have suffered damage to their home
Tá de chuspóir ag an scéim tacaíocht airgeadais a sholáthar do dhaoine a bhí thíos le díobháil a rinneadh dá dteach
It is designed to alleviate hardship rather than provide full compensation for damage
Tá an scéim in ainm is cruatan a fhuascailt, seachas cúiteamh iomlán a sholáthar do dhíobháil
There is a separate emergency scheme to help small businesses administered by the Irish Red Cross
Tá scéim éigeandála ar leith chun cabhrú le gnóthaí beaga riaradh ag Crois Dhearg na hÉireann
If you are affected by flooding in any of the following areas you can contact the Department of Social Protection at the numbers below:
Má bhíonn tú thíos le tuile in aon cheann de na ceantair a leanas, féadfaidh tú teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an Roinn trí ghlao ar na huimhreacha thíos:
│Athlone, Co. Westmeath │(090) 6449650 │
│Baile Átha Luain, Contae na hIarmhí │(090) 6449650 │
│Contae an Chláir, Contae Luimnigh │(061) 436010, (061) 436027 │
Cork, Co. Kerry │(021) 4805475 │
│Contae Chorcaí, Contae Chiarraí │(021) 4805475 │
│Contae na Gaillimhe │(091) 536773 │
│Contae Mhaigh Eo │(094) 9063707 │
Leitrim, Co. Donegal │(071) 9113765 │
│Contae Shligigh, Contae Liatroma, Contae Dhun na nGall │(071) 9113765 │
Louth, Co. Monaghan │(042) 9392686 │
│Contae an Chabháin, Contae Lú, Contae Mhuineacháin │(042) 9392686 │
│Counties Offaly, Laois, Kilkenny, North and South Tipperary │(057) 931 854 │
│Contae Uíbh Fhailí, Laoise, Chill Chainnigh, Thiobráid Thuaidh agus Theas │(057) 9318543 │
│​Contae Phort Láirge │​(051) 356000 │
│​Contae Loch Garman │​(053) 9165400 │
│Contae Cheatharlach │​086 8371159 │
If you have been affected by flooding and meet a means test you may be eligible
Má d’imir tuile tionchar ort agus má chomhlíonann tú tástáil mhaoine, d’fhéadfá a bheith incháilithe
What is covered by the scheme?
Cad atá cumhdaithe ag an scéim?
Emergency income support payments
Íocaíochtaí tacaíochta ioncaim éigeandála
Damage to your home and its essential contents, such as:
Díobháil a rinneadh do do theach agus an t-inneachar buntábhachtach atá ann, ar nós an mhéid a leanas:
• Household appliances and bedding
• Fearais tí agus cóir leapa
Structural damage may also be considered
Féadtar breithniú a dhéanamh ar dhíobháil struchtúrach chomh maith
What is not covered under the scheme?
Cad nach bhfuil cumhdaithe ag an scéim?
• Commercial and business losses
• Caillteanais tráchtála agus ghnó
• Losses covered by an insurance policy
• Caillteanais atá cumhdaithe ag polasaí árachais
• Loss or damage to private rented accommodation or local authority accommodation
• Díobháil a rinneadh do chóiríocht phríobháideach ar cíos nó do chóiríocht údaráis áitiúil nó cailleadh na cóiríochta sin
The income test determines your household’s ability to meet the costs of restoring your home to a habitable condition
Deimhníonn an tástáil ioncaim cumas do theaghlaigh chun íoc as na costais atá ar bhail inchónaithe a chur ar do theach
All household income will be considered
Déanfar breithniú ar an ioncam uile teaghlaigh
Single people: If you have a gross household income of €30,000 or less you will get 100% of the amount allowable
Daoine singil: Má tá ollioncam teaghlaigh €30,000 nó níos lú agat, gheobhaidh tú 100% den tsuim atá incheadaithe
For each whole €1,000 of household income above €30,000 you will be required to make a 1% contribution to the amount allowable
I dtaobh gach €1,000 iomlán d’ioncam teaghlaigh os cionn €30,000 atá agat, beidh ort ranníocaíocht 1% a dhéanamh leis an tsuim atá incheadaithe

For example if you are single and have a gross household income of €35,000 you will get 95% of the amount allowable (€5,000 over the income limit of €30,000 = 5% personal contribution towards the loss)

Mar shampla, más duine singil thú agus má tá ollioncam teaghlaigh €35,000 agat, gheobhaidh tú 95% den tsuim atá incheadaithe (€5,000 os cionn na teorann ioncaim €30,000 = 5% den ranníocaíocht phearsanta i dtreo an chaillteanais)
Couples: If you are married, in a civil partnership or cohabiting and have a household income of €50,000 or less you will get 100% of the amount allowable
Lánúineacha: Má tá tú pósta, i bpáirtnéireacht shibhialta nó ag comhchónaí le duine eile agus má tá ioncam teaghlaigh €50,000 nó níos lú agat, gheobhaidh tú 100% den tsuim atá incheadaithe
For each whole €1,000 of household income above €50,000 you will be required to make a 1% contribution to the amount allowable
I dtaobh gach €1,000 iomlán d’ioncam teaghlaigh os cionn €50,000 atá agat, beidh ort ranníocaíocht 1% a dhéanamh leis an tsuim atá incheadaithe
Children: The income limits are increased by €10,000 for each qualified child
Leanaí: Méadaítear na teorainneacha ioncaim €10,000 i dtaobh gach linbh cháilithe
One-parent household: The income limits that apply to couples also apply to one-parent households - €50,000 plus €10,000 for each dependent child
Teaghlach aontuismitheora: Baineann na teorainneacha a chuirtear i bhfeidhm i measc lánúineacha le teaghlaigh aontuismitheora chomh maith – €50,000 móide €10,000 i dtaobh gach linbh chleithiúnaigh
Non-dependent adult household members: For each non-dependent adult member of the household 20% of their gross income is added to the household income
Daoine neamhchleithiúnacha fásta muinteartha: I dtaobh gach duine mhuinteartha neamhchleithiúnaigh den teaghlach, suimítear 20% dá n-ollioncam le hioncam an teaghlaigh

For example, a couple with a gross income of €45,000 with a non-dependent adult in the house with an income of €20,000 will receive 100% of the amount allowable as the household income is less than €50,000 (€45,000 + €4,000 = €49,000)

Mar shampla, gheobhaidh lánúin ag a bhfuil ollioncam €45,000 lena bhfuil duine fásta neamhchleithiúnach sa teach ag a bhfuil ioncam €20,000 100% den tsuim atá incheadaithe mar gheall gur lú ioncam an teaghlaigh ná €50,000 (€45,000 + €4,000 = €49,000)

People who opted not to insure: If you had no insurance and you do not have reasonable grounds for not having insurance, you will be expected to contribute the first €2,000 toward the amount allowable and your personal contribution will be 2% for each whole €1,000 above the appropriate income level for your household

Daoine a roghnaigh gan an teach a chur faoi árachas: Mura raibh aon árachas agat agus mura bhfuil bunúis réasúnta agat gan árachas a bheith agat, beifear ag súil leis go ranníocfaidh tú an chéad €2,000 i dtreo na suime atá incheadaithe agus is ionann a bheidh do ranníocaíocht phearsanta agus 2% i dtaobh gach €1,000 iomlán os cionn an leibhéil ioncaim i gcás do theaghlaigh
How much can be paid to individual applicants?
Cé mhéid is féidir a íoc le hiarratastóirí aonair?
Levels of payment will depend on the relative severity of damage experienced and your ability to meet these costs
Braithfidh leibhéil íocaíochta ar dhéine choibhneasta na díobhála a rabhthas thíos léi agus ar do chumas chun íoc as na costais seo
Where structural work is an issue, the Department may get advice from a loss adjustor
Sa chás go bhfuil obair struchtúrach i gceist, féadfaidh an Roinn comhairle a fháil ó choigeartóir caillteanais
In assessing cases for humanitarian assistance, account will be taken of Exceptional Needs Payments and Urgent Needs Payments already paid out
Nuair atá measúnú á dhéanamh ar chásanna i dtaobh cabhair dhaonnúil, cuirfear Íocaíochtaí ar Riachtanais Eisceachtúla agus Íocaíochtaí ar Riachtanais Phráinneacha san áireamh a íocadh amach
To apply for Humanitarian Assistance you should complete the Humanitarian Assistance application form (pdf)
Chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar Chabhair Dhaonnúil, ba cheart duit an fhoirm iarratais ar Chabhair Dhaonnúil a chomhlánú(pdf)
This form is also available from your local office
Tá an fhoirm seo ar fáil, chomh maith, ó d’oifig áitiúil
Where available you must include the following with your application:
Sa chás go bhfuil fáil orthu, ní mór duit an méid a leanas a chur ar fáil le d’iarratas:
• Evidence of household income (payslips etc)
• Fianaise i leith ioncaim teaghlaigh (duillíní pá etc),
• Estimates for repairs or replacement
• Meastacháin do dheisiúcháin nó d’ionadú,
• A copy of your insurance policy
• Cóip de do pholasaí
• Any other information which may support your claim
• Aon fhaisnéis eile a d’fhéadfadh tacú le d’éileamh
To apply for Humanitarian Assistance contact the Department of Social Protection's representative (formerly known as the Community Welfare Officer) at your local office
Chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar Chabhair Dhaonnúil, déan teagmháil le hionadaí na Roinne Coimirce Sóisialaí (ar ar tugadh an tOifigeach Leasa Pobail roimhe seo) ag d’oifig áitiúil
